sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button'; import { Store } from '../Store'; export default function ShippingScreen() { const [fullname , setFullname] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart').shipping.fullname ? localStorage.getItem('fullname') : '')) const [adress , setAdress] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart').shipping.adress ? localStorage.getItem('adress') : '')) const [city , setCity] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart').shipping.city ? localStorage.getItem('adress') : '')) const [postalcode , setPostalcode] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart').shipping.postalcode ? localStorage.getItem('adress') : '')) const [country , setCountry] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart').shipping.country ? localStorage.getItem('adress') : '')) const {state , dispatch} = Store function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() dispatch({type : 'SET_SHIPPING_INFO' , payload : {fullname : fullname , city : city, postalcode : postalcode , country : country, adress : adress}}) } return ( <>

Sign-in

Shipping

Payment

Place Order

Shipping address

{handleSubmit(e)}}> Full Name {setFullname(e.target.value)}}/> Address {setAdress(e.target.value)}}/> City {setPostalcode(e.target.value)}}/> Postal Code {setCity(e.target.value)}}/> Country {setCountry(e.target.value)}}/>
) }
